title: The Holy Roman Empire
brief_description: Describes how an enormous section of western Europe was united under the idea of a single Christian government. Costumed re-enactments dramatize the division of powers and conflict between the popes and the emperors and the factors which led to the eventual decay of the Holy Roman Empire.
